titleInfo.title: Supplementary Material - Solving a tool-based interaction task using deep reinforcement learning with visual attention

mods.abstract: Supplementary Material for the Conference Proceeding "Solving a tool-based interaction task using deep reinforcement learning with visual attention" by Fleer et al. The provided file is a short movie of the learned policy for the proposed learner using 6 glimpses and a 20 x20 context image.
